DOC.brief_title: Hypofractionated Whole-breast Irradiation With Simultaneously Integrated Boost For Early-Stage Breast Cancer After Breast-conserving Surgery
DOC.criteria: Female 1860 year old Treated breast conversing surgery sentinel lymph node biopsy axillary lymph node dissection Pathologically confirm invasive breast cancer A pathological T12N0M0 tumor Tumor bed labeled Titanium clip Negative surgical margin Written inform consent .
